## FirebaseStorageError class

An error returned by the Firebase Storage SDK.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FirebaseStorageError extends FirebaseError 
```
<b>Extends:</b> FirebaseError

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `FirebaseStorageError` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [customData](./storage.firebasestorageerror.customdata.md) |  | { serverResponse: string \| null; } | Stores custom error data unque to FirebaseStorageError. |
|  [message](./storage.firebasestorageerror.message.md) |  | string | Error message including serverResponse if available. |
|  [serverResponse](./storage.firebasestorageerror.serverresponse.md) |  | null \| string | Optional response message that was added by the server. |
